question_text: How would you design an event-driven architecture on GCP to provide real-time sentiment analysis for customer interactions, feeding into a Generative AI system for automated response generation?
hook_text: Unlock real-time customer insights! Build an event-driven Generative AI architecture on Google Cloud that scales.
cta_text: Master real-time AI; follow for daily Cloud Architect insights!

answer_sections.title: Ingest & Stream
answer_sections.text: Capture customer events, stream to Pub/Sub, process with Dataflow.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Real-time customer interaction events are captured, published to Google Cloud Pub/Sub, and then processed for initial sentiment extraction using Dataflow.

answer_sections.title: Analyze & Infer
answer_sections.text: Analyze processed data in BigQuery, trigger Generative AI via Vertex AI.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Processed data lands in BigQuery for real-time analytics, triggering Vertex AI for Generative AI model inference to draft intelligent responses.

answer_sections.title: Monitor & Refine
answer_sections.text: Monitor model performance, continuously refine with feedback loop.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Continuous monitoring of Generative AI model performance using Vertex AI Model Monitoring ensures quality, with feedback loops enabling iterative model refinement.

title_card_text: GCP Event-Driven AI for Real-Time Analytics
